name: MostaScene (Leggendario Reietto)
description:
MOSTARDA'S GONE MISSING! HELP US OUT!

  Escapist expert

MostaScene is a narrative videogame designed and structured to tell the story of the 5 district of Padua (Armistizio-Savonarola) with a particular focus on the Palestro district. Thanks to a small narrative device, those who play are led to meet various realities of the neighborhood and to learn about its stories, its present, and imagining a possible future.

In this Mobile game you need to help the protagonist find Mostarda the cat around three different scenes. Tap different points of interest on the screen to help the citizens with their problems and look around for Mostarda jumping out from his different hide-outs.

Use the Overworld to tap and select your destination. You need to reach the end of each scene for the protagonist to move on to another scene. 

When Mostarda appears from his hide-out and runs away that's the cue to change locations!

Tap the bus stop when the map's completed to go back to the overworld and select another destination.

PLEASE NOTE: the application is not yet officially present in the Play Store yet, so some smartphones may refuse installation. To solve this problem, it is necessary to accept, through the phone settings, the use of unofficial third-party apps.
